title: I cannot download LOL
body: I have tried every thread and support document I have repeated them multiple times. I still can not download LOL. It gets to the league of legends emblem and is loading the white bar. gets about 10 percent(estimating) in and stops then it disappears I have let it sit here and download for hours nothing happened. Once it disappears I have check task manager for the processor. and nope. SO please help me D.:

replies.body:
When League fails to launch, it can be caused by a number of different reasons, however, the most likely in this scenario is a permissions issue. A lot of files and software packages outside of the league directory are accessed by the League Client, and if system permissions aren't assigned to the client, it can fail to launch. Our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) will take you through the most common solutions and it's a great place to start troubleshooting this issue.

Let me know if you still have issues after working through that guide.

Tbh sounds like you either have a very slow connection which this [GUIDE ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)should help you with. 

Also are you trying to download on a new pc or?..
Negative. Just got back from a deployment. Already have played league o this pc before.
